name: MusiC!icker
description:
MusiC!icker (pronounced "music clicker") is a music themed idle game for Android.

Slide to sing and produce notes, which will be used to hire musicians and create a strange orchestra. Level up yourself and your musicians to produce even more notes!

Try to reach level 60...

The game has been developed by a 16 years old game developer. This is his first published game. No external assets has been used. Everything about graphics, audio and programming is original. The game runs with Unity Engine, while the audio is handled by AudioKinetic Wwise.

The game might still have quite a few bugs. If you find one, please send feedback in the comment section below, or write an email at digital.studios.game.dev@gmail.com
